attributes.action: Make more doctors aware of  Mastocytosis and start research into this disease.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mastocytosis is an extremely rare disease affecting both adults and children. It can affect both the skin and internal organs.
We would like more doctors to be aware of this disease and research started into it. 
Please look at our website www.ukmasto.co.uk for more information.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make more doctors aware of Mastocytosis and start research into this disease."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23050


Prime Minister's Office
